name: PLTW Intro to Engineering
description: Designed for 9th or 10th grade students, the major focus of IED is the design process and its application. Through hands-on projects, students apply engineering standards and document their work. Students use industry standard 3D modeling software to help them design solutions to solve proposed problems, document their work using an engineerâ€™s notebook, and communicate solutions to peers and members of the professional community
